movie.title: 10 Promises to My Dog
movie.description_intro: A teenage girl adopts a homeless puppy and names it "Socks". They take care of each others since then, until one day when she is thinking Socks to be smaller than she thought it used be...
movie.description_full: A teenage girl adopts a homeless puppy and names it "Socks". They take care of each others since then, until one day when she is thinking Socks to be smaller than she thought it used be...

movies.title: The Fure Fure Girl
movies.summary: When a schoolgirl is hit in the head with infatuation for an attractive school baseball player she has to figure out a way to get into his world. Unfortunately, she is bad at baseball. She can join the cheering squad, however, and support the team and, of course, be close to the man. She takes her new role quite seriously.
movies.description_full: When a schoolgirl is hit in the head with infatuation for an attractive school baseball player she has to figure out a way to get into his world. movies.title: The Controller
movies.summary: A billionaire's wife is abducted. Now, he is forced to play a game where getting his wife back is the prize...eight hours to win...only he's never played a game like this. He calls on the only people who can help: the Armchair Combat Professionals.

movies.title: Eat Brains Love
movies.summary: Eat, Brains, Love is a laugh-out-loud funny, surprisingly romantic, zombie road trip movie filled with heart - and brains.
movies.description_full: Eat, Brains, Love is a laugh-out-loud funny, surprisingly romantic, zombie road trip movie filled with heart - and brains.

movies.title: El club de los buenos infieles
movies.title_english: El club de los buenos infieles
movies.title_long: El club de los buenos infieles (2017)
movies.summary: Four childhood friends, all married with no passion left, get together in a high school reunion dinner. Between laughs and drinks, they all agree that they love their wives but no longer desire them. Together they hatch an illogical project: a secret club for men who want to cheat, so that they themselves can regain lust for their wives.
movies.description_full: Four childhood friends, all married with no passion left, get together in a high school reunion dinner.
